text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: 『Naritasan Fudoson』…… I don't know why, but it's a place I had in my mind for a long time.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Ah, yes. I should buy some souvenir for Brianchan♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: If I remember correctly, this place is famous for receiving blessings for traffic safety… I wonder if it applies to racing as well?
